channel.title: .AVI Video Files
channel.description:
I was trying to make an animated .gif, and the thing I thought was the easiest, I'm having the hardest time finding! So, I was wondering where I could find a Site where I could download movies (preferably anime) in the .AVI format.
Thanks in Advance!

item.title: .AVI Video Files
item.dc:creator: @Areithe Areithe
item.description:
@Areithe wrote:

thanks, oh, and one more question, I went to gametrailers, but I can only download the “movies” not the “user movies”…Ya, it’s propably a nooby question, but help is appreciated!

Read full topic

item.title: .AVI Video Files
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Get a torrent client, such as utorrent(search google) and start downloading torrents of TV shows. I use mininova.org and thepiratebay.org and of course my personal favorite, google.

Read full topic

item.title: .AVI Video Files
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Just find a site like gametrailers.com and download wmv file then get a video converter.
